# lakefs_branch (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "lakefs_branch" "main" {
  repository = "my-repository"
  branch     = "main"
}

output "current_commit" {
  value = data.lakefs_branch.main.commit_id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `branch` (String)
- `repository` (String)

### Read-Only

- `commit_id` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
